SEARCH
Package grafiosch

Class BaseConstants

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.BaseConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
GlobalConstants
public abstract class BaseConstants extends Object
Abstract base class containing application-wide constants and configuration values.

This class centralizes all constant definitions used throughout the application including date formats, security constraints, field size limits, user-defined field configurations, rate limiting parameters, and system defaults. It provides a single source of truth for configuration values that need to be consistent across different modules.

    • PREFIXES_PARAM

      public static final Set<String> PREFIXES_PARAM
      Set of valid parameter prefixes for configuration. A dependent application should extend this prefix accordingly. For example, used for the daily user limits of CUD transactions.

    • LIMIT_SECURITY_BREACH

      public static final String LIMIT_SECURITY_BREACH
      Message key for NLS in the event when user tries to write tenant data outside the defined limits. For example a watchlist may have a maximum of instruments, if it is exceeded then this exception thrown.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPT

      public static final int MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPT
      Maximum number of failed login attempts before user account is blocked. With this number of failed attempts for a user login, the user will be blocked. The IP address is taken into consideration.

    • STEAL_DATA_SECURITY_BREACH

      public static final String STEAL_DATA_SECURITY_BREACH
      User tries to access shared data outside its boundary. For example access history quotes of a security or currency pair which has no context to the tenant data.
